typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{National Provider Identifier} as string,
		{Last Name/Organization Name of the Provider} as string,
		{First Name of the Provider} as string,
		{Middle Initial of the Provider} as string,
		{Credentials of the Provider} as string,
		{Gender of the Provider} as string,
		{Entity Type of the Provider} as string,
		{Street Address 1 of the Provider} as string,
		{Street Address 2 of the Provider} as string,
		{City of the Provider} as string,
		{Zip Code of the Provider} as string,
		{Provider RUCA} as string,
		{State Code of the Provider} as string,
		{Country Code of the Provider} as string,
		{Provider Type of the Provider} as string,
		{Medicare Participation Indicator} as string,
		{Number of HCPCS} as string,
		{Number of Services} as string,
		{Number of Medicare Beneficiaries} as string,
		{Total Submitted Charge Amount} as string,
		{Total Medicare Allowed Amount} as string,
		{Total Medicare Payment Amount} as string,
		{Total Medicare Standardized Payment Amount} as string,
		{Drug Suppress Indicator} as string,
		{Number of HCPCS Associated With Drug Services} as string,
		{Number of Drug Services} as string,
		{Number of Medicare Beneficiaries With Drug Services} as string,
		{Total Drug Submitted Charge Amount} as string,
		{Total Drug Medicare Allowed Amount} as string,
		{Total Drug Medicare Payment Amount} as string,
		{Total Drug Medicare Standardized Payment Amount} as string,
		{Medical Suppress Indicator} as string,
		{Number of HCPCS Associated With Medical Services} as string,
		{Number of Medical Services} as string,
		{Number of Medicare Beneficiaries With Medical Services} as string,
		{Total Medical Submitted Charge Amount} as string,
		{Total Medical Medicare Allowed Amount} as string,
		{Total Medical Medicare Payment Amount} as string,
		{Total Medical Medicare Standardized Payment Amount} as string,
		{Average Age of Beneficiaries} as string,
		{Number of Beneficiaries Age Less 65} as string,
		{Number of Beneficiaries Age 65 to 74} as string,
		{Number of Beneficiaries Age 75 to 84} as string,
		{Number of Beneficiaries Age Greater 84} as string,
		{Number of Female Beneficiaries} as string,
		{Number of Male Beneficiaries	} as string,
		{Number of Non-Hispanic White Beneficiaries	} as string,
		{Number of Black or African American Beneficiaries} as string,
		{Number of Asian Pacific Islander Beneficiaries} as string,
		{Number of Hispanic Beneficiaries} as string,
		{Number of American Indian/Alaska Native Beneficiaries} as string,
		{Number of Beneficiaries With Race Not Elsewhere Classified} as string,
		{Number of Beneficiaries With Medicare Only Entitlement} as string,
		{Number of Beneficiaries With Medicare & Medicaid Entitlement} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Atrial Fibrillation} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Alzheimerâ€™s Disease or Dementia} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Asthma} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Cancer} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Heart Failure} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Chronic Kidney Disease} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Depression} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Diabetes} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Hyperlipidemia} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Hypertension} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Ischemic Heart Disease} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Osteoporosis} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Rheumatoid Arthritis / Osteoarthritis} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Schizophrenia / Other Psychotic Disorders} as string,
		{Percent (%) of Beneficiaries Identified With Stroke} as string,
		{Average HCC Risk Score of Beneficiaries} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 window(desc({Number of Medicare Beneficiaries}, false),
	Cum_Num_Ben = sum(toInteger({Number of Medicare Beneficiaries}))) ~> WindowCumBenCount
WindowCumBenCount window(desc({Total Medical Medicare Standardized Payment Amount}, true),
	cum_payment_amt = sum(toInteger({Total Medical Medicare Standardized Payment Amount}))) ~> CumPaymentCount
